mapper.insert: INSERT INTO asm_cores (location, name, template_engine) VALUES (#{location}, #{name}, #{templateEngine})
INSERT INTO asms (name, type, description, asm_core_id) VALUES (#{name}, #{type}, #{description}, #{core.id})
INSERT INTO asm_attrs (asm_id, name, type, label, options, value, large_value) VALUES (#{asmId}, #{name}, #{type}, #{label}, #{options}, #{value}, #{largeValue})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM asms ORDER BY name ASC

SELECT asm.*, attr.asm_id AS attr_asm_id, attr.name AS attr_name, attr.type AS attr_type, attr.options AS attr_options, attr.value AS attr_value, attr.large_value AS attr_large_value, core.id AS core_id, core.location AS core_location, core.name AS core_name, core.template_engine AS core_template_engine FROM asm_parents AS parent INNER JOIN asms asm ON asm.id = parent.asm_parent_id LEFT OUTER JOIN asm_attrs attr ON attr.asm_id = asm.id LEFT OUTER JOIN asm_cores core ON core.id = asm.asm_core_id WHERE parent.asm_id = #{id}
SELECT id FROM asms WHERE name = #{name}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ASM_SYSPROPS (asm_id, property, value) VALUES (#{asmId}, #{property}, #{value})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM ASM_SYSPROPS WHERE asm_id = #{asmId} AND property = #{property}
mapper.select: SELECT sp.value FROM ASM_SYSPROPS sp WHERE sp.asm_id = #{asmId} AND sp.property = #{property}
